thread.title: Lena Dunham Shows Off Her Dramatic Weight Loss On the Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Lena Dunham Shows Off Her Dramatic Weight Loss On the Red Carpet

author: Faith Brar
title: Lena Dunham Shows Off Her Dramatic Weight Loss On the Red Carpet
text:
Lena Dunham stepped out on the red carpet this Wednesday looking happy and healthy. Flaunting a cute workout ensemble, the Girls star made an appearance to support her trainer and friend, Tracy Anderson, at her New York City studio opening. 
Via Getty Images 
Earlier this week, the 30-year-old took to Instagram to share her new-found appreciation for health and wellness by posting a photo of herself practicing yoga. "Health is wealth (she says as she crawls across the bathroom floor begging for a donut and a Zantac and a pony..)," she captioned the pic. "Trying my darnedest." A post shared by Lena Dunham (@lenadunham) on Mar 14, 2017 at 5:24pm PDT 
Back in 2015, she told Hollywood Life that she turned to exercise as a way to cope with her anxiety and not to change the way she looked. "To those struggling with anxiety, OCD, depression: I know it's mad annoying when people tell you to exercise, and it took me about 16 medicated years to listen," she said at the time. 
"I'm glad I did. It ain't about the a**, it's about the brain." True that.
